Player History

Drafted in 6th round, 116th overall pick, by Cincinnati in 1969...
Injured on 8/29/1970 with a Pulled Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 6-7 weeks...

Injured on 9/2/1976 with a Inflamed Anterior Cruciate Ligament, out for 5-6 weeks...

Signed as a free agent by Minnesota on 2/7/1985 to a 3-year deal worth $4,100,000 per year...

Won Batter of the Month award on 7/1/1987, hitting .391 with 5 HR, 26 RBI...
